title: Is Japan a strange place to live? - Quora

response.answer_text: I think it’s a pleasant place to be and the strangeness adds character to it. That being said, Japan isn’t really all that strange. I would even say that life in Japan is relatively boring and predictable. Perhaps the uniformity of the Japanese people might be the weirdest thing about Japan. Other than that, it’s a stable country with its own quirks like any other nation.

Its only strange if you use your country or culture as reference point for what is “normal”. Strangeness might deviate by degrees from what you consider to be normal but for those of who who live here its no different than being in any other country.
